humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there are metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (2 out of 19 lymph nodes were positive for metastatic carcinoma). Therefore, based on New Rule 12, the N stage is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma involving one out of one lymph node in sentinel node #1, and six out of nineteen lymph nodes positive for metastatic carcinoma in level II of the right axillary contents. This corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N2.
